response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which holds immense value for us and I believe it will be equally beneficial for you. Given its worth to us, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $1,150,000. This offer reflects our commitment to finding the right buyer who will appreciate and utilize the product to its full potential. We trust that this price will be attractive to you considering the product's value to you stands at $1,200,000. Let's make this transaction a win-win for both parties. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1150000}
